properties.name: active
properties.desc: If true, the button is a toggle and is currently in the active state.

jsdoc.description: If true, the button is a toggle and is currently in the active state.
jsdoc.orig:
*
       * If true, the button is a toggle and is currently in the active state.

properties.name: pointerDown
properties.desc:
True if the element is currently being pressed by a "pointer," which
is loosely defined as mouse or touch input (but specifically excluding
keyboard input).

jsdoc.description:
True if the element is currently being pressed by a "pointer," which
is loosely defined as mouse or touch input (but specifically excluding
keyboard input).
jsdoc.orig:
*
       * True if the element is currently being pressed by a "pointer," which
       * is loosely defined as mouse or touch input (but specifically excluding
       * keyboard input).

properties.name: pressed
properties.desc: If true, the user is currently holding down the button.

jsdoc.description: If true, the user is currently holding down the button.
jsdoc.orig:
*
       * If true, the user is currently holding down the button.

properties.name: receivedFocusFromKeyboard
properties.desc:
True if the input device that caused the element to receive focus
was a keyboard.

jsdoc.description:
True if the input device that caused the element to receive focus
was a keyboard.
jsdoc.orig:
*
       * True if the input device that caused the element to receive focus
       * was a keyboard.

properties.name: toggles
properties.desc:
If true, the button toggles the active state with each tap or press
of the spacebar.

jsdoc.description:
If true, the button toggles the active state with each tap or press
of the spacebar.
jsdoc.orig:
*
       * If true, the button toggles the active state with each tap or press
       * of the spacebar.

properties.name: _asyncClick
properties.desc: event handler to unwind before triggering another event

jsdoc.description: event handler to unwind before triggering another event
jsdoc.orig: event handler to unwind before triggering another event

properties.name: _changedButtonState
properties.desc: provide hook for follow-on behaviors to react to button-state

jsdoc.description: provide hook for follow-on behaviors to react to button-state
jsdoc.orig: provide hook for follow-on behaviors to react to button-state

properties.name: _pressedChanged
properties.desc: any of these changes are considered a change to button state

jsdoc.description: any of these changes are considered a change to button state
jsdoc.orig: any of these changes are considered a change to button state

properties.name: disabled
properties.desc: If true, the user cannot interact with this element.

jsdoc.description: If true, the user cannot interact with this element.
jsdoc.orig:
*
       * If true, the user cannot interact with this element.

properties.name: focused
properties.desc: If true, the element currently has focus.

jsdoc.description: If true, the element currently has focus.

*
       * If true, the element currently has focus.
